cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 12 bed shared mixed dormitory room with 6 bunk beds. Shared bathroom facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
10 bed shared mixed dormitory room with 5 bunk beds. Shared bathroom facilities.
Note: Attic has 2 x 10 bed mixed dorm rooms and guests will be allocated at Attic's discretion and subject to availability.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private spacious Double (double bed) with natural light and opening windows. Bed linen provided. Shared bathroom facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private 4 Bed Dorm with 2 x bunk beds with natural light and opening windows. Bed linen provided. Shared bathroom facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
